text: Luna Lauren Vélez (born November 2, 1964) is an American actress. ==Family== She is the identical twin sister of actress Lorraine Vélez. ==Roles== Her most notable roles are as *María LaGuerta on Showtime's Dexter, *Detective Nina Moreno on Fox's New York Undercover, *Dr. Gloria Nathan on HBO's prison drama Oz, *Elena on ABC's comedy-drama Ugly Betty. Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:American television actors
title: Lauren Vélez
